page.title: The $itemName
page.text: The $itemName is a powerful long range Energy weapon, that fires powerful single phaser bolts. It also allows the player to zoom in for significantly greater accuracy.
The range of the $itemName allows it for kills over great distances. It is also the weapon that benefits most by weapon scopes, especially the [item name=sniper_scope].
Ranged rogue androids can wield this weapon as well, and will be quite deadly and will target enemies from great distances.

Like most energy weapons the $itemName can be rapidly recharged by [item name=energy_pack], overhead if fired continually without stopping and can be upgraded using weapon modules at the [block name=weapon_station].
The $itemName allows for all types of weapon modules including weapon sights.

page.title: Stats
page.text: The $itemName can also be dropped by Ranged Rogue Androids. There are also Legendary versions of the sniper dropped only by Legendary Rogue Androids. The Legendary versions can have increased base stats that can stack with weapon modules. Stats such as higher meta fire rate and greater accuracy.
